resources.string: OLD CONTED WILL BE REMOVE AFTER EDITING AND IMAGE WILL BE SET TO DEFAULT IF THERE IS NO VALID INPUT

string-array.name: DennisRitchie
string-array.item: Im not a person who particularly had heros when growing up
I fix things now and then, more often tweak HTML and make scripts to do things
Over the past several years, Ive been more in a managerial role

string-array.name: MarkZ
string-array.item: The thing that we are trying to do at facebook is just help people connect and communicate more efficiently
We are running the company to serve more people
The question isnt What do we want to know about people, Its, What do people want to tell about themselves

string-array.name: Law
string-array.item: It’s Microsoft versus mankind, with Microsoft having only a slight lead
If an innovative piece of software comes along, Microsoft copies it and makes it part of Windows. This is not innovation; this is the end of innovation
Sometimes there is no happy choice, only one less griveous than the others

resources.string: Dennis MacAlistair Ritchie was an American computer scientist. He created the C programming language and, with long-time colleague Ken Thompson, the Unix operating system and B programming language
Mark Elliot Zuckerberg is an American internet entrepreneur and philanthropist. He is known for co-founding Facebook, Inc.
